column4: glxgears doesn't show anything after I installed the ati drivers; how can i fix that?
what ati driver? fglrx or the open source one?
dunno about that then, what graphics card do you use?
weird, it should say something like mine here: OpenGL renderer string: MOBILITY RADEON X700 Generic
but there's nothing in the glxgears window?
thers fps output to the terminal though
then I don't have any clues.. you could try to reinstall the driver and all the packages with it, but the result would be the same I think
